short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to test Script Management policies locally. Experiment with settings in-browser instead of activating a policy on staging.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Script Management Tester Chrome plugin can be used to test actions such as deferring and blocking scripts locally in the browser, and see the impact on the site before taking action in Script Management.
